abstract: Comprehensive testing best practices guide for Playwright with Next.js applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 43 rules across 8 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (test architecture, stable selectors) to incremental (debugging, CI integration). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics to guide reliable, fast, and maintainable E2E test development.
